name: Cyber Cops
description:
1. Tell us about your game: Cyber Cops is a single-player shooter with a focus on mechanics. In tradition of classic arcade games, you are working towards a high score where kills reward points. 

2. Tell us how your game fits the theme: In this game, you control two characters, Bluecoat and Redcoat. You are able to switch between them and shoot with both of them as certain enemies can only be defeated by only Bluecoat's bullets or only Redcoat's bullets.

3. Mention any assets (with links) used in the game that was either taken from the internet or made before the jam began: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HgQ501qhFbg&t=34s (neon light sound effect in the main menu). Basic spritework for bluecoat and some of the background was made before the jam.
